Description: Send a message with card attached
Steps:
Open Kibopush
1- Login 
2- Go to Broadcasts
3- Click on Create New Broadcast
4. Click on Create New Broadcast
5- Click on Card
6. Upload Image
7. Click on Enter Title
8. Write "Title"
9. Click on Enter subtitle 
10. Write "Sample text"
11. Click component add button
12. Click on enter title
13. Write Card Title
14. Click on Enter a link
15. Write www.google.com
16. Click on Done
11. Click on Send
12. Verify Alert
Expected Results: Card should broadcated to all the customers

Description: Send a message with Gallary attached
Steps:
Open Kibopush
1- Login 
2- Go to Broadcasts
3- Click on Create New Broadcast
4. Click on Create New Broadcast
5- Click on Gallery
6. Upload Image
7. Click on Enter Title
8. Write First Image
9. Click on Enter subtitle 
10. Write A sample image
11. Next Image
12. Upload Image
13. Click on Enter Title
14. Write First Image
15. Click on Enter subtitle 
16. Write A sample image
17. Click component add button
18. Click on enter title
19. Write Card Title
20. Click on Enter a link
21. Write www.google.com
22. Click on Done
23. Click on Send
24. Verify Alert
Expected Results: Gallery should broadcated to all the customers
